title: Sharkmo (skin idea+concept)

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body:
Hei guys/gals. 

Sharkmo skin concept here. 

Particle changes:

Q - shark tooth. 
E - no changes.
W - bubbles.
R - clam shells. 

Tl;dr: Teemo in a shark suit. 

Enjoyyy~
